mediaDisplay.text:
To play music during a slideshow, you must first start the music and then start the slideshow.
I. Start the music: 1. Press "Menu" on the remote, highlight "Music" in the main menu, and press "OK" on the remote to display the Music screen. 2. Use the arrow keys to browse through your music lists and select music to play during your slideshow. - OR - Press "Menu" again to select "Search" and look for specific music. 3. When you’ve selected the music you want to play, press the Play button on the remote.
II. Start the slideshow: 1. Press "Menu" on the remote, highlight "Pictures" in the main menu, and press "OK" on the remote to display the Pictures screen. 2. To play all the pictures on all the external devices connected to the media player, select the first picture and press the Play button on the remote. - OR - To play a specific folder of images, press "Menu" again, select "Browse Folders" in the Pictures menu, find the image folder you want to play, and press the Play button.
